cmp: 车 (car/a vehicle/machine/to shape with a lathe, vehicle on land)
可 (can/may/able to/certain(ly)/to suit/(particle used for emphasis))

exm.mng: variant of 坎坷[kan3 ke3], bumpy (of a road), rough (of life)
Jing Ke (-227 BC), celebrated in verse and fiction as would-be assassin of King Ying Zheng of Qin 秦嬴政 (later the First Emperor 秦始皇)
